name: Sergeant Brooks Carlson
Lore: 'Veteran pathfinder. Defected with General Madine. Recruited as a Scout for the newly-formed commando unit.',
Text: 'Landspeed=2. Allows your other scouts present at same exterior site to move with him (using landspeed=2) for free. Adds 1 to immunity to attrition of all your scouts present at same exterior site who have immunity.',
